mapper.select: select * from sugboard order by seq desc
mapper.update: update sugboard set contents = #{contents}, regdate = sysdate where seq = #{seq}
update sugboard set viewcount = viewcount+1 where seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert:
insert into sugboard (seq,title,writer,contents,regdate)
values ((SELECT MAX(SEQ)+1 FROM sugboard), #{title},#{writer},#{contents},sysdate)
